page.title: 08ARGUMENTS FOR THE COALMINE
page.content: In 11 years there will be a coalmine in Kenilworth.It will be the largest in Britain. People say it will produce more jobs for teenagers and people living near by. The new mine will probably mean a great growth in industry so both industrial estates will prosper. Hopefully with the sudden growth in population there will be better facilites for the public.A new sports centre is being built which might be expanded in the future. The old railway in Crackley Woods which will be near the mine will probably be opened to ship coal to nearby power stations. If the railway were to be opened it would mean an easier link to larger cities. New roads would have to be built as well, which will be slip roads around Kenilworth.Over all we think that the mine will be a good thing for Kenilworth.
